DOC.detailed_description: Two arm enrol study , 18 naive-treatment Chinese patient acute HIV-1 infection phase would allocate two arm , treat antiretroviral drug ( Tenofovir plus lamivudine plus Lopinavir / ritonavir plus raltegravir ) . Six month later , 12 patient treated Triplitode , order observe impact Triptolide wilfordii HIV-1 reservoir patient acute infection phase . All patient explore 18 month term clinical feature , drug side-effects , immunological viral response , HIV-1 reservoir . We hypothesis Triptolide wilfordii might reduce HIV-1 reservoir . The result would provide proofs practical antiviral therapy patient acute infection phase China resource limited country .
